name: Ling Rise
overview: Join Ginball in his quest to find the legendary Ling Master is this Action RPG from Ascii. Along the way you'll encounter many Lings and fight against the evil dictator Mubara. Lings are ancient creatures which will help you in your battles. At the beginning of the game Ginball arrives at a town and there he knows a girl that asked his to be her bodyguard through the snow mountains to arrives the town at the top, after taking her there they are put on a jail and when someone release them he got to defeat the evil man on charge on the town, when the player defeats him he will have to go out of the town and return to the first town of the game to continue the adventure but to arrive there he will have to escape a snow avalanche... Will you help Ginball in his journeys? The game is a 3D Platform game with some RPG elements.
